name: marikobot-hashi
description: A discord.js wrapper to create bots in a simpler way. Used for MarikoBot.
author: Elouann H. (https://github.com/elouannh)

scripts.clean: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run lint
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run run-builder && tsc && git add .
scripts.prepublish: pnpm run build && git commit -m "[BUILD] Automatic build"
scripts.post-version-push: git push && pnpm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: pnpm version patch && pnpm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-minor: pnpm version minor && pnpm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-major: pnpm version major && pnpm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-prerel: pnpm version prerelease --preid=prerelease && pnpm run post-version-push
